document.full_text: as the eighth-seeded rangers convene for their first playoff practice monday for their opening series against the top-seeded capitals, they have a bit of history on their side.
document.title: eighth-seeded rangers have reasons to like their chances against capitals
lines_and_colors: as the eighth-seeded rangers convene for their first playoff practice monday for their opening series against the top-seeded capitals, they have a bit of history on their side.
